thread.title: FBI director confirms inquiry into Russia and Trump campaign – video
thread.title_full: FBI director confirms inquiry into Russia and Trump campaign – video

author: Guardian Staff
title: FBI director confirms inquiry into Russia and Trump campaign – video
text:
US elections 2016 FBI director confirms inquiry into Russia and Trump campaign – video 
FBI director James Comey on Monday publicly confirmed for the first time that the FBI is investigating Russia’s efforts to interfere in the 2016 presidential election, including any potential coordination between Trump campaign associates and Russia’s government. Comey said he had been given special permission by the Department of Justice to comment on the investigation’s existence
